item.title: 商业内幕》称，特斯拉将在德国工厂裁员 300 名临时工
item.description: 据 Business Insider 周三援引知情人士的话报道，作为全球裁员计划的一部分，特斯拉计划在柏林附近的德国工厂裁减 300 名临时工。【原文：Tesla is planning to lay off 300 temporary workers at its German plant near Berlin as part of plans to cut global staff, Business Insider reported on Wednesday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 亚马逊将把无收银台购物技术推广到更多第三方商店，同时自己也将退缩
item.description: 亚马逊公司（Amazon.com）周三表示，该公司计划今年将其无收银台购物技术推广到更多的第三方商店，同时减少对自家商店无收银台购物技术的依赖。【原文：Amazon.com said on Wednesday it plans to push its cashierless shopping technology into more third-party stores this year, even as it reduces its reliance on the technology in its own.】

item.title: 消息人士称，微软与 OpenAI 的交易将躲过欧盟的正式合并调查
item.description: 熟悉内情的消息人士周三表示，欧盟反垄断监管机构已认定微软对 OpenAI 的 130 亿美元投资不属于并购，这意味着该交易将避免欧洲的正式调查，否则美国科技巨头可能会面临繁重的补救措施。【原文：EU antitrust regulators have concluded that Microsoft's $13 billion investment into OpenAI is not an acquisition, sources familiar with the matter said on Wednesday, signaling the deal will avoid a formal European probe that could have led to onerous remedies for the U.S. tech giant.】

item.title: 美国移动称 5G 是重点，70 亿美元资本支出计划仍在进行中
item.description: 墨西哥电信巨头 America Movil 表示，该公司正在其各个市场投资 5G 技术，并将继续按计划执行今年制定的 71 亿美元资本支出计划。【原文：Mexican telecommunications giant America Movil said it is investing in 5G across its markets as it remains on track to implement its $7.1 billion capital expenditure plan set for this year.】

item.title: 银行被要求预测使用人工智能和机器学习的风险
item.description: 全球银行业最高监管机构周三表示，作为日常管理的一部分，银行必须预测在运营中使用人工智能（AI）和机器学习（ML）所带来的风险。【原文：Banks must anticipate risks from using artificial intelligence (AI) and machine learning (ML) in their operations as part of their day-to-day governance, a top global banking regulator said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 欧盟隐私监管机构称，Meta 应为用户提供无定向广告的免费选项
item.description: 欧盟隐私监管机构欧洲数据保护委员会（European Data Protection Board）周三表示，Meta Platforms 和其他大型在线平台应向用户提供免费使用其服务的选择，而不提供有针对性的广告。【原文：Meta Platforms and other large online platforms should give users an option to use their services for free without targeted advertising, EU privacy watchdog the European Data Protection Board said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 大众田纳西工厂工人投票决定是否加入 UAW
item.description: 去年秋天，美国汽车工人联合会（UAW）主席肖恩-费恩（Shawn Fain）在与底特律三大汽车制造商的斗争中取得了一系列胜利，现在他正试图利用自己的影响力，将那些不在工会管辖范围内的美国其他汽车厂组织起来。【原文：After a series of victories against the Detroit Three automakers last fall, United Auto Workers (UAW) President Shawn Fain is now trying to use his influence to organize other U.S. auto factories that have stayed out of the union's ambit.】

item.title: 美国贸易代表办公室戴先生呼吁采取 "果断 "行动，保护电动汽车行业免受中国影响
item.description: 美国贸易代表凯瑟琳-戴周三表示，她预计将 "很快 "结束对中国商品征收关税的审查，并必须采取 "果断 "行动保护电动汽车和其他行业免受中国补贴竞争的影响。【原文：U.S. Trade Representative Katherine Tai said on Wednesday that she expects to conclude a review of tariffs on Chinese goods "very soon" and must take "decisive" actions to protect electric vehicles and other industries from subsidized Chinese competition.】

item.title: 美国联邦航空局向阿拉斯加航空公司发出地面停飞警告
item.description: 美国联邦航空管理局周三对阿拉斯加航空发布了地面停飞公告，称："阿拉斯加所有干线和支线航班地面停飞"【原文：The U.S. Federal Aviation Administration issued a ground stop advisory on Wednesday for Alaska Airlines , saying: "All Alaska mainline and subcarrier flights ground stopped."】

item.title: 华尔街希望埃隆-马斯克回答特斯拉 Model 2 汽车的问题
item.description: 埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）在路透社 4 月 5 日独家报道特斯拉取消了 2.5 万美元的 "Model 2 "电动汽车计划后，发布了一些含糊不清的社交帖子，这让投资者一直心存疑虑。【原文：Elon Musk has kept investors hanging since he issued cryptic social posts following an exclusive April 5 Reuters report that Tesla had scrapped its plans for a $25,000 “Model 2” electric vehicle.】

item.title: 马士基称巴尔的摩备用航道深度不够
item.description: 丹麦航运集团周三在一份声明中说，巴尔的摩港备用航道的深度不足以容纳马士基和其他承运商使用的远洋集装箱船。【原文：The Baltimore port's alternate shipping channels are not deep enough to accommodate the oceangoing container vessels that Maersk and other carriers use, the Danish shipping group said in a statement on Wednesday.】

item.title: 消息人士称，欧盟隐私监管机构反对 Meta 的收费模式
item.description: 一位直接了解此事的人士周三表示，欧盟隐私监管机构将发表意见，称 Meta 平台不能为确保用户隐私而向用户收取费用。【原文：The EU privacy watchdog is set to issue an opinion saying Meta Platforms can't charge users a fee to ensure their privacy, a person with direct knowledge of the matter said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 福特汽车董事长称美国汽车业被政客 "鞭打
item.description: 福特汽车公司执行董事长比尔-福特（Bill Ford）周三表示，美国汽车行业需要华盛顿政客们提供监管的确定性，而白宫易主后的反反复复也无济于事，但电动汽车的采用率将继续增长。【原文：The U.S. auto industry needs regulatory certainty from politicians in Washington and the back and forth as the White House changes hands doesn't help, but the adoption rate of electric vehicles will continue to grow, Ford Motor's executive chairman Bill Ford said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 美国参议院听证会聚焦波音公司的安全文化
item.description: 波音公司的制造工艺在1月中旬的空中面板爆炸事故后陷入了全面的安全危机，本周三，波音公司将在美国参议院的两场听证会上接受审查。【原文：Boeing's manufacturing practices, at the center of a full blown safety crisis following a Jan mid-air panel blowout, will come under scrutiny on Wednesday in two U.S. Senate hearings.】

item.title: 调查发现，银行在信息应用程序审查方面落后了
item.description: 周三公布的一项调查显示，全球金融公司在监控和归档所有使用个人消息应用程序进行的业务相关通信方面正在落后，可能面临监管违规和罚款的风险。【原文：Global financial companies are falling behind on the monitoring and archiving of all business-related communications using personal messaging apps, a survey released on Wednesday showed, potentially running the risk of regulatory breaches and fines.】

item.title: 白宫称对中国金属征收新关税不会影响通胀
item.description: 白宫经济顾问贾里德-伯恩斯坦（Jared Bernstein）周三表示，拜登政府正在考虑大幅提高对中国金属产品的关税，但这不会影响美国的通货膨胀，而且对国家安全来说也是必要的。【原文：Sharply higher tariffs on Chinese metal products being considered by the Biden administration would not affect U.S. inflation and are necessary for national security, White House economic adviser Jared Bernstein said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 雅培医疗器械销售强劲，季度利润超预期
item.description: 雅培实验室（Abbott Laboratories）周三公布的季度利润超出华尔街预期，并上调了预期下限，原因是医疗程序的强劲需求促进了其设备（包括血糖监测产品）的销售。【原文：Abbott Laboratories beat Wall Street estimates for quarterly profit on Wednesday and raised the lower end of its forecast, as robust demand for medical procedures boosted sales of its devices, including its glucose-monitoring products.】

item.title: 巴西航空工业公司伊夫称已与 AirX 签署意向书，将出售多达 50 架 eVTOL
item.description: 电动飞机制造商伊夫公司（Eve）周三表示，该公司已与日本公共直升机包机服务公司 AirX 签署了一份意向书，将出售多达 50 架电动垂直起降飞机（eVTOL）。【原文：Electric aircraft maker Eve has signed a letter of intent with Japan's public helicopter charter service company AirX to sell up to 50 electric vertical take-off and landing (eVTOL) aircraft, it said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 特斯拉要求股东投票支持马斯克的薪酬计划
item.description: 电动汽车制造商特斯拉周三敦促股东投票赞成批准亿万富翁埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）在首席执行官薪酬方案下的报酬提议，而就在几个月前，特拉华州的一名法官拒绝了他创纪录的 560 亿美元薪酬。【原文：Electric automaker Tesla on Wednesday urged shareholders to vote in favour of a proposal to ratify billionaire Elon Musk's compensation under the CEO pay package, just months after a Delaware judge rejected his record-breaking $56 billion pay.】

item.title: 消息人士称，特斯拉公司马斯克可能在访问印度期间公布 20-30 亿美元的投资计划
item.description: 两位熟悉讨论情况的消息人士称，特斯拉首席执行官埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）下周访问新德里会见印度总理纳伦德拉-莫迪（Narendra Modi）时，将宣布在印度投资 20-30 亿美元，主要用于建设新工厂。【原文：Tesla chief Elon Musk is set to announce an investment in India of $2-$3 billion, mainly for building a new factory, when he visits New Delhi next week to meet Prime Minister Narendra Modi, two sources familiar with the discussions said.】

item.title: 业绩超出 "极低 "预期，美国联合航空公司大涨
item.description: 美国联合航空公司（United Airlines）股价周三盘前上涨约 5.3%，原因是该公司上调了第二季度利润预期，而且第一季度业绩强劲，尽管因飞机制造商波音公司（Boeing）的安全危机而遭受了 2 亿美元的损失。【原文：United Airlines shares rose about 5.3% premarket on Wednesday, driven by an upbeat profit forecast for the second quarter and strong first-quarter results despite a $200 million hit over planemaker Boeing's safety crisis.】

item.title: 谷物供过于求，美国小麦种植者面临黯淡的作物经济效益
item.description: 由于全球供应充足，小麦价格维持在近四年来的最低点附近，同时包括设备和运输在内的成本居高不下，美国小麦种植者越来越难以获得利润，许多人预计无法在 2024 年实现收支平衡。【原文：Profit is growing further out of reach for U.S. wheat farmers and many do not expect to break even in 2024 as ample global supply keeps prices around their lowest in nearly four years at the same time costs including equipment and transport remain high.】

item.title: 据《纽约时报》Dealbook 报道，美国联邦贸易委员会准备提起诉讼，阻止 Tapestry 以 85 亿美元收购 Capri 公司
item.description: 据《纽约时报》Dealbook 周三援引知情人士的话报道，美国联邦贸易委员会（FTC）正准备提起诉讼，阻止 Coach 母公司 Tapestry 以 85 亿美元收购 Michael Kors 所有者 Capri Holdings 的交易。【原文：The U.S. Federal Trade Commission (FTC) is preparing to sue to block Coach parent Tapestry's $8.5 billion deal to buy Michael Kors owner Capri Holdings , NYT Dealbook reported on Wednesday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 航空航天零部件制造商 Loar Holdings 在美国 IPO 的目标估值高达 22.8 亿美元
item.description: 航空航天零部件制造商 Loar Holdings 在周三提交的一份文件中表示，其在美国首次公开募股的目标估值最高可达 22.8 亿美元。【原文：Loar Holdings is aiming for a valuation of up to $2.28 billion in its initial public offering in the United States, the aerospace parts manufacturer said in a filing on Wednesday.】

item.title: 石油价格上涨对世界市场意味着什么？
item.description: 今年迄今为止，油价上涨了约 16%，接近每桶 90 美元，由于中东紧张局势升级以及乌克兰和俄罗斯之间对能源基础设施针锋相对的攻击，市场对供应的担忧加剧。【原文：Oil prices are up around 16% so far this year near $90 a barrel, with supply worries high given escalating Middle East tensions and tit-for-tat attacks on energy infrastructure between Ukraine and Russia.】

item.title: 独家报道Mobileye 将出货至少 4600 万片新型辅助驾驶芯片
item.description: 以色列汽车技术公司 Mobileye 周三表示，随着汽车制造商竞相提高汽车的安全性和易驾性，该公司已获得订单，将在未来几年内出货 4600 万个 EyeQ6 Lite 辅助驾驶芯片。【原文：Israeli automotive tech company Mobileye said on Wednesday it had secured orders to ship 46 million of its EyeQ6 Lite assisted-driving chips over the next few years as automakers race to makes cars safer and easier to drive.】

item.title: 巴基斯坦国家安全部称社交媒体平台 X 因国家安全问题被封
item.description: 巴基斯坦内政部周三表示，出于国家安全考虑，已在 2 月大选前后封锁了社交媒体平台 X 的访问权限，这证实了长期以来被怀疑的关闭行为。【原文：Pakistan's interior ministry said on Wednesday it had blocked access to social media platform X around the time of February's election on national security concerns, confirming a long-suspected shutdown.】

item.title: 越南 VinFast 第一季度收入增加，汽车交付量增加
item.description: 越南电动汽车制造商 VinFast 周三公布，由于汽车交付量增加，公司第一季度收入有所增长。【原文：Vietnamese electric-vehicle maker VinFast reported higher first-quarter revenue on Wednesday on the back of increased vehicle deliveries.】

item.title: 期指在巨型股支撑下稳步上扬；财报和美联储评论即将发布
item.description: 周三，美国股指期货上涨，多数大型成长股上涨，而投资者则在等待央行决策者的收益和评论，以判断美国企业的经营状况。【原文：U.S. stock index futures rose on Wednesday as most megacap growth stocks gained, while investors awaited earnings and commentary from the central bank's policymakers to gauge how corporate America was faring.】

item.title: Netflix用户增长受关注，密码共享打击带来的收益被认为有所缓解
item.description: Netflix 在经历了两个季度的大幅增长后，其保持用户增长的计划将成为周四公布财报时的焦点，一些分析师警告说，打击密码共享所带来的收益将有所缓解。【原文：Netflix's plan to maintain subscriber growth after two quarters of blockbuster increases will be in focus when it reports earnings on Thursday, with some analysts warning that gains from a crackdown on password sharing are set to ease.】
